main event: A civilian reported seeing a semi-circular white light with a pulsating red light above it for 3 minutes in Auburn, New York in 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as a semi-circular white light with a red pulsating light above it.
The sighting was reported to Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program that investigated UFO reports.
The case was concluded as a 'Probable AIRCRAFT'.

The report also includes a separate sighting from 1969 of a circular, blinking object the size of a volleyball at an altitude of 1500 ft or less, moving northwest and disappearing towards the Buffalo area.
sighted object: semi-circular white light with a red pulsating light above it
